title: Meditation Pillow - Traveler Set Card 9 of 9
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace the Aid trait with the Tool trait.

Elder's notes: This simple change prevents Rangers from using Voice of the Elders or Pokodo to repeatedly add sessions to the Meditation Pillow, allowing a solo Ranger to have a potentially infinitely-long day. Infinitely long days are generally not a feature of the Valley.
